org.treetank.io.berkeley

Class BerkeleyStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.io.berkeley.BerkeleyStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBackend

    public final class BerkeleyStorage
extends Object
implements IBackend
    Factory class to build up IBackendReader IBackendWriter instances for the Treetank Framework. After all this class is implemented as a Singleton to hold one BerkeleyStorage per SessionConfiguration.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.treetank.io.IBackend

        IBackend.IBackendFactory
